content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you schedule a service appointment. May I get your name to get started?
Thank you, Linda! Can you please provide the address where you need the plumbing service?
Thanks, Linda. Let me check if your address is within our service area.
reason: system error while checking service area, needs operator help

content: Uh, is everything okay? Did you get my address?
reason: system error while checking service area, needs operator help

content: Hi Linda, this is Joe from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the delay—our system had a hiccup. Yes, I have your address at 123 Maple Lane and you are within our service area! What would be the best day and time for our plumber to come out?
Oh great, thanks! Can they come out this Thursday afternoon?

I’ve checked, and we do have an opening this Thursday afternoon. I’ll book you for a 2 PM window. You’ll get a reminder before your appointment. Please let us know if you have any special requests or if you need to reschedule. Thanks for your patience, Linda!
